game.name: TERRACOTTA
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Puzzle your way through 80+ hand-crafted levels in this uniquely challenging action-adventure game. Unleash world-shifting abilities, awaken ancient mechanisms, and defeat 8 brutal bosses - balancing cunning and force to rescue the cursed spirits of your fellow warriors.
